title: Top End Times News – Verified Links

content.headline: 📈 “Central Banks Race Toward One‑World Digital Currency!”
content.relation: Frequent tests and pilots of CBDCs reflect growing global economic centralization—echoing Revelation 13’s beast system controlling commerce.

content.headline: ⚠️ “Crypto Bill Spurs Rulebook on CBDCs—Global Control Looms?”
content.relation: New U.S. legislation about stablecoins and CBDCs may pave the way to a monitored financial system—prophetic mark-like oversight of economic behavior.

content.headline: 🌍 “FEMA-Led Tsunami Warnings After Kamchatka Megathrust – World Gripped in Fear!”
